description: Chief Minister Arogya Arunachal Yojana provides cashless health insurance of up to Rs. 5 lakh per family for hospitalization in empanelled hospitals.
key_features: Coverage up to Rs. 5 lakh per family per year

benefits.coverage_amount: Up to Rs. 5 Lakh per family per year

criteria: Families not covered under Ayushman Bharat

steps: Register through scheme portal or health centers

special_notes: Complements Ayushman Bharat for uncovered families
